techmeme.title: Google makes Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro generally available and introduces 2.5 Flash-Lite, which it says is its most cost-efficient and fastest 2.5 model yet (Tulsee Doshi/The Keyword)
Salesforce says it will increase prices on many products in August, including Slack; major product lines will see a 6% increase on average (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
Eigen Labs raised $70M via a token purchase by a16z and launched EigenCloud, which helps developers cryptographically prove what happens in off-chain apps (Liam Wright/Forbes)
Disney and Amazon partner to let media buyers using Amazon's DSP have better tools to target consumers on ad-tier programming across Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+ (Erik Hayden/The Hollywood Reporter)
AI-powered virtual physical therapy startup Sword Health raised $40M led by General Catalyst at a $4B valuation, up from its $3B valuation from June 2024 (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
